title: Structured Self-Directed Learning Design and Operational Strategies for [Large-Scale] Web-Based Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Tool Proficiency and Foundational Language Learning Skills
context.additional_context: Intensive language training for professionals to improve workplace language proficiency. Conducted in a BYOD environment with parallel offline collaborative activities in classrooms.

learning_goals: Learners can perform self-directed learning for 8 hours per week using structured digital materials
Learners engage in peer feedback-based interaction activities at least twice per week on online discussion boards
Learners achieve language proficiency test scores improved by 20% compared to pre-assessment by course completion
Learners rate satisfaction at 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale in educational satisfaction surveys
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
